column4: I am having a really irritating problem after upgrade from 10.04 to 12.04 - my keyboard goes to sleep after a second or two, and misses then the first few keys typed when it "awakes"
any hints how to solve this? Should I just do a reinstall?
did you install any power-saving tools like laptop-mode-tools or anything?
I don't think so, but when I search for "power" with synaptic there are multiple packages installed
could gnome-power-manager do the keyboard suspending?
could be, but I don't use it, so you'll have to ask someone else
